verses.name: Jeremiah 23:37
verses.text: Thus shalt thou say to the prophet, What hath the Lord answered thee? and, What hath the Lord spoken?

verses.name: Jeremiah 23:38
verses.text: But since ye say, The burden of the Lord; therefore thus saith the Lord; Because ye say this word, The burden of the Lord, and I have sent unto you, saying, Ye shall not say, The burden of the Lord;

verses.name: Jeremiah 23:39
verses.text: Therefore, behold, I, even I, will utterly forget you, and I will forsake you, and the city that I gave you and your fathers, and cast you out of my presence:
